channel.title: Safe zone
channel.description:
i usually dont try to make safe zones but i feel like changing it up a bit so ive got some questions.....
where it says
[code]if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )|| [/code]
is that where the safe zone begins and where it ends... ive looked for tuts to clearify this for me but havent found any id apreciate the help
dont flame

item.title: Safe zone
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Find out the coords of where you wan’t your safe zone to start and end.

E.G

| |<
| |
| |
| |
| |
|___________| <

Find the coords where the arrows are pointing to. Then add 'em in.

Like from ----,---- to ----,---- to ----,---- to ----,----.

Read full topic

item.title: Safe zone
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

OK Wait a second and I’ll try and hit you up with a more detailed answer.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 04, 2007, 04:45:59 PM[/size][hr]

Find this public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

Then replace it with this public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 2668 && absX <= 2683 && absY >= 3414 && absY <= 3429) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

Find (absX >= 2668 && absX <= 2683 && absY >= 3414 && absY <= 3429) that, and replace those coords with the ones on ‘Entrana’. You’ll have to get those on your own.

Btw that’s from AZN’s tut.

Read full topic
